GK19raggancu:3: ānandaplavamānabodhamadhurāmodacchaṭāmeduraṃ taṃ bhūmānamupāsmahe pariṇataṃ dantāvalasyātmanā dantāvalo gajastasyevāsyaṃ mukhaṃ yasya sa gajānanastadātmanā tadrūpeṇa pariṇataṃ taṃ bhūmānaṃ paraṃ brahmopāsmahe |
GK19raggancu:8: tadvivartarūpaḥ prapañca eva madhurāmodacchaṭātvena rūpitastena meduram |
GK19raggancu:12: vidhūto vividho vyāsaṅgo yairata eva śuddho ya āśayastasminprādurbhūtaḥ sudhārasaḥ śāntisukhaṃ yeṣāṃ te ca te prasṛmaraṃ prasāri dhyānaṃ yasminnīdṛśaṃ yadāspadaṃ kaṃdarādi tadadhyāsinaśca teṣām ||
GK19raggancu:13: tāraśrīparaśaktikāmavasudhārūpānugāṃ yaṃ vidustasmai stātpraṇatirgaṇādhipataye yo rāgiṇābhyarthyate
GK19raggancu:14: āmantrya prathamaṃ vareti varadetyārtena sarvaṃ janaṃ svāminme vaśamānayeti satataṃ svāhādibhiḥ pūjitaḥ // RMgan_2 //
GK19raggancu:16: paraśaktirmāyābījam, kāmaḥ kāmabījam, vasudhā bhūmibījam, iti pañcarūpāṇāṃ bījānāmanu gamityakṣarametādṛśaṃ yaṃ sādhakā vidustasmai gaṇādhipataye
GK19raggancu:19: ārtena rāgiṇā prathamaṃ vareti tato varadetyāmantryābhyarthyate |
GK19raggancu:23: mantre tu gaṇapataye tathā sarvajanamityekameva padam |
GK19raggancu:28: kallolānāṃ mahormīṇāmañcalāḥ prāntāstairāśliṣṭā meghatatiryenaitādṛśa ikṣurasasamudre suradrumāṇāṃ pārijātādīnāṃ vanaṃ tadāmodena paripuṣṭe |
GK19raggancu:29: ratnamayaṃ dvīpaṃ vārimadhyasthalaṃ tadgatasya kalpatarormūle mahāmaṇimayaṃ pīṭhaṃ tatra ṣaṭkoṇayuktatrikoṇakarṇīkāyukte
GK19raggancu:32: āśliṣṭaṃ priyayā sarojakarayā ratnasphuradbhūṣayā māṇikyapratimaṃ mahāgaṇapatiṃ viśveśamāśāsmahe cakraṃ prasiddham, prāsastriśūlaḥ, rasālakārmukamikṣudhanuḥ, gadā
GK19raggancu:33: prasiddhā, bījapūro mātuliṅgam, dvijaḥ svakīyo dantaḥ, vrīhyagraṃ
GK19raggancu:34: śālimañjarī, utpalaṃ prasiddham, pāśapaṅkaje ca prasiddhe, evaṃ daśāyudhāni kareṣu yasya |
GK19raggancu:35: śuṇḍāgre puṣkare jāgratsthito ghaṭo ratnapūrṇo hemakumbho yasya |
GK19raggancu:36: kamalahastayā priyayā dakṣiṇahastenāliṅgitaṃ māṇikyapratimaṃ śoṇacchaviṃ sarveśvaraṃ mahāgaṇapatimāśāsmahe
GK19raggancu:38: trailokyeṣṭāvidhānavarṇasubhagaṃ yaḥ padmarāgopamaṃ dhatte sa śriyamātanotu satataṃ devo gaṇānāṃ patiḥ // RMgan_5 //
GK19raggancu:39: dānāmbhasā madāmbunā parimeduraṃ vyāptaṃ prasṛmarānvyālambino rolambānbhramarānbibhartīti prasṛmaravyālambirolambabhṛt |
GK19raggancu:41: padmarāgopamaṃ padmarāgo lohitakastadupamaṃ praśastidvayaṃ yo dhatte sa gaṇānāṃ patirdevaḥ satataṃ śriyamātanotu |
GK19raggancu:42: yathā mṛdambulipte dāruphalake raktacūrṇaṃ dattvākṣarāṇi, tathā dānāmbulipte sindūravati kumbhasthale bhramarā ityuktaṃ bhavati ||
GK19raggancu:44: dikkāntāghanasāracandanarasāsārāḥ śrayantāṃ manaḥ svacchandaprasarapraliptaviyato herambadantatviṣaḥ herambadantatviṣo manaḥ śrayantām |
GK19raggancu:46: bhrāmyato mandarasya ghūrṇanāvṛttayastadāyattasya kṣīrābdhervīcayo laharyastāsāṃ chaṭā agrabhāgāstaiḥ sadṛśāḥ |
GK19raggancu:57: jyotsnāpūrataraṅge mantharaṃ tarantī cāsau saṃdhyā ca tasyā vayasyāḥ sāmyātsakhyaḥ |
GK19raggancu:60: dānāmodavinodalubdhamadhupaprotsāraṇāvirbhavatkarṇāndolanakhelano vijayate devo gaṇagrāmaṇīḥ śuṇḍāpradhṛtasuvarṇakalaśasaṃgṛhītena kṣaratā bahutvādbahirapi nirgacchatā muktāmāṇikyādiratnasamūhena koṭiśaḥ sādhakajanānsaṃbhāvayannasaṃkhyātānupāsakānsaṃpadā vardhayan /
GK19raggancu:65: herambaṃ praṇamāmi yasya purataḥ śāṇḍilyamūle śriyā bibhratyāmburuhe samaṃ madhuripuste śaṅkhacakre vahan /
GK19raggancu:66: nyagrodhasya tale sahādrisutayā śaṃbhustayā dakṣiṇe bibhrāṇaḥ paraśuṃ triśūlamitayā pāśāṅkuśābhyāṃ śubham // RMgan_9 //
GK19raggancu:67: śāṇḍilyamūle bilvavṛkṣasyādho yasya mahāgaṇapateḥ purato 'grabhāge padme bibhratyā śriyā samaṃ te prasiddhe śaṅkhacakre vahanmadhuripurviṣṇurasti |
GK19raggancu:68: tathā yasya dakṣiṇe nyagrodhasya tale vaṭavṛkṣādhaḥ pāśāṅkuśābhyāmitayā sahitayādrisutayā pārvatyā saha paraśuṃ triśūlaṃ ca bibhrāṇaḥ śaṃbhuḥ śivo
GK19raggancu:70: paścātpippalamāśrito ratipatirdevasya ratyotpale bibhratyā samamaikṣavaṃ dhanuriṣūnpauṣpānvahanpañca ca /
GK19raggancu:71: vāme cakragadādharaḥ sa bhagavānkroḍaḥ priyaṃgostale hastodyacchukaśālimañjarikayā devyā dharaṇyā saha // RMgan_10 //
GK19raggancu:72: devasya paścime pippalavṛkṣasyādha utpale bibhratyā ratyā samamaikṣavaṃ dhanuḥ pañca pauṣpāniṣūṃśca vahan ratipatiḥ kāmadevo 'sti /
GK19raggancu:73: asya ca vāme priyaṃguvṛkṣādho hastodyacchukaśālimañjarikayaikasminkare kīramanyatra kalamakaṇiśaṃ bibhratyā dharaṇyā saha sa prasiddho bhagavānkroḍo varāho 'sti taṃ herambaṃ praṇamāmīti pūrveṇānvayaḥ ṣaṭkoṇāśriṣu ṣaṭsu ṣaḍ gajamukhāḥ pāśāṅkuśābhīvarānbibhrāṇāḥ pramadāsakhāḥ pṛthumahāśoṇāśmapuñjatviṣaḥ
GK19raggancu:74: āmodaḥ purataḥ pramodasumukhau taṃ cābhito durmukhaḥ paścātpārśvagato
GK19raggancu:75: 'sya vighna iti yo vighnakarteti ca // RMgan_11 //
GK19raggancu:76: ṣaṭkoṇasya pīṭhasya ṣaṭsvaśriṣu pālīṣu ṣaḍ gajamukhā dhyeyāḥ |
GK19raggancu:81: pṛthuścāsau mahāśoṇāśmanāṃ padmarāgāṇāṃ puñjastadvattviṭ kāntiryeṣāṃ te |
GK19raggancu:82: yadi 'pṛthumahāḥ'; iti visargāntaḥ pāṭhastadā bhinnaṃ padam |
GK19raggancu:87: puraḥ kalpitapūrvadigapekṣayāgnikoṇe pramodaḥ, evamīśānakoṇe sumukha ityarthaḥ |
GK19raggancu:89: asya durmukhasya vighna iti yasya nāma sa ekasminpārśve vighnakarteti yasya nāma sa dvitīyapārśve 'sti |
GK19raggancu:91: āmodādigaṇeśvarapriyatamāstatraiva nityaṃ sthitāḥ kāntāśleṣarasajñamantharadṛśaḥ siddhiḥ samṛddhistataḥ
GK19raggancu:92: kāntiryā madanāvatītyapi tathā kalpeṣu yā gīyate sānyā yāpi madadravā tadaparā drāviṇyamūḥ pūjitāḥ // RMgan_12 //
GK19raggancu:93: kāntasya svasvabharturāliṅganarasaṃ jānantyata eva mantharā rāgiṇī dṛgyāsāṃ tāḥ |
GK19raggancu:94: āmodādīnāṃ pūrvaślokoktānāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāryāsteṣāṃ samīpe sthitā dhyeyāḥ |
GK19raggancu:95: tāsāṃ nāmāni ca - siddhiḥ, samṛddhiḥ, kāntiḥ, madanāvatī, madadravā,
GK19raggancu:97: āśliṣṭau vasudhetyatho vasumatī tābhyāṃ sitālohitau varṣantau vasu pārśvayorvilasatastau śaṅkhapadmau nidhī /
GK19raggancu:100: vasudhayā vasumatyā ca krameṇāliṅgitau śuklaraktavarṇau dhanaṃ varṣantau tau śaṅkhapadmasaṃjñau prasiddhau nidhī ṣaṭkoṇapārśvayorvilasataḥ /
GK19raggancu:104: ṣaṭkoṇādbahiḥsthite 'ṣṭadalakamala indrādayo dikpālāstadbāhye teṣāṃ samīpa eva paripatatkālānalajyotiṣaḥ pradīptasvarūpā indrādīnāṃ hetayo vajrādyā dhyeyāḥ ||
GK19raggancu:106: ānandaikarasāvabodhalaharīvidhvastasarvormaye sarvatra prathamānamugdhamahase tasmai parasmai namaḥ // RMgan_14 //
GK19raggancu:107: 'herambaṃ praṇamāmi'; (9/10) iti ślokābhyāṃ viṣṇuśivādisvarūpaistanurmūrtiryasya sa tasmai
GK19raggancu:113: te ca - jāyate, asti, vardhate, vipariṇamate, apakṣīyate, naśyatīti ca |
GK19raggancu:114: ānandaikarasāvayodhalaharībhirvidhvastāḥ sarveṣāṃ sādhakānāmūrmayaḥ ṣaḍindriyajanyā vṛttayo yasmādityeke |
GK19raggancu:116: sarvatra prathamānaṃ mugdhaṃ sundaraṃ maho yasya tasmai parasmai jagato
GK19raggancu:119: rājannīrājanaśrīsakhacaraṇanakhadyotavidyotamānaḥ śreyaḥ stheyaḥ sa deyānmama vimaladṛśo bandhuraṃ sindhurāsyaḥ // RMgan_15 //
GK19raggancu:123: te ca te devāsuranarāṇāṃ samūhāsteṣāṃ dedīpyamānamukuṭāgrāṇāṃ yā koṭiḥ saṃkhyāviśeṣastatra vyāṭīkamānāḥ susaṃgatāḥ sūryatulyaratnapaṅktikāntipravāhāsteṣām |
GK19raggancu:124: rājantī nīrājanaśrīrārātrikaśobhā tasyāḥ sakhāyaste ca te caraṇanakhāśca teṣāṃ dyotena prakāśena vidyotamānaḥ sa prasiddhaḥ sindhurāsyo gajamukhaḥ
GK19raggancu:126: mama bandhuraṃ ramyaṃ stheyaḥ sthirataraṃ śreyaḥ kalyāṇaṃ deyāt |
GK19raggancu:128: 'vimaladṛśā'; iti pāṭhe tu saumyāvalokanena śreyo dadyādityarthaḥ ||
GK19raggancu:130: yaḥ stauti pracurataraṃ mahāgaṇeśaṃ tasyeyaṃ bhavati vaśaṃvadā trilokī // RMgan_16 //
GK19raggancu:134: || iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryavaryaśrīrāghavacaitanyaviracitaṃ mahāgaṇapatistotraṃ tacchiṣyakṛtayā ṭippaṇyā sametaṃ samāptam ||
